summary: HELLO, 2000 A6 HAS AN AUXILIARY FAN ON THE 2.8 ENGINE. MY AUDI WAS IN WARRANTY ON 10/17/02, AND IT WAS BROUGHT TO THE DEALER. THE DEALER WAS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE THE PROBLEM. THE PROBLEM IS THE FAN MAKES ALOT OF NOISE, AND THE FAN SMELLS LIKE A FIRE IS HAPPENING..NOW THE LOCAL DEALER, WAGNER AUDI IN BOYLOSTON, MA CHECKED THE CAR, AND WILL NOT COVER IT UNDER WARRANTY.. THIS SHOULD BE CHECKED OUT BEFORE SOMEONE IS HURT IN A FIRE FROM THIS AUDI A6 PROBLEM.  THANKS,  DON MELANSON.    *NLM
